name: Thai Long Bean Salad Recipe (Som Tum Tua)
description: This easy and healthy Thai long bean salad recipe is quick to make with traditional Thai ingredients. Som tum tua is ready in 10 minutes and perfect for warm summer days!

video.name: How to make a Thai salad with long beans. #spicy  #thaisalad  #saladrecipe #thaifoodlover #thaifood

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the long beans into medium-sized pieces, chop the tomatoes into small chunks, and cut the lime in half.
recipeInstructions.name: Slice the long beans into medium-sized pieces, chop the tomatoes into small chunks, and cut the lime in half.

recipeInstructions.text: Crush the garlic and dried chilies with a mortar and pestle.
recipeInstructions.name: Crush the garlic and dried chilies with a mortar and pestle.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the long beans, pounding until they start to burst open so they can soak up the dressing.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the long beans, pounding until they start to burst open so they can soak up the dressing.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix in the fish sauce, fermented fish sauce, tamarind paste, and palm sugar. Pound until palm sugar is completely dissolved.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix in the fish sauce, fermented fish sauce, tamarind paste, and palm sugar. Pound until palm sugar is completely dissolved.

recipeInstructions.text: Squeeze in fresh lime juice, throw in the peel, followed by the tomatoes. Give it all a gentle but good mix and serve your spicy long bean salad immediately. Enjoy!

review.reviewBody: Made this tonight to go with dinner! It reminded me of being in Thailand. Great recipe. So much flavour! I will definitely be making this again!
